channel.title: Music – Void_Chords feat.L
channel.description: Recent content in Void_Chords feat.L on Music

item.title: Void_Chords feat.L - Beyond Selves ("RWBY 氷雪帝国"OP)
item.description:
작곡: 高橋諒 / 작사: Konnie Aoki
KY: 44831

Extremes

confining reason

Creation

mass divisions refined

Inflated observations

We’re bound to find

The truth inside,

beyond selves

(Attention)

Just close your eyes

(Constant)

Vision predetermined

(And blinded)

World of ivory,

Follow the tracks,

dimensions

Misread again

(Function)

Find truth within,

let’s go on

As you lay,

the sand is falling

There’s

a need to face

The light for there’s

no time to waver

Dark shades

attract the brightness

As brightness guide

the shadows we hide

Shatter

all preconception

This future

destination

Opposing sides

will interweave

Beyond

selves

To overcome

in alliance

And progress…

inside

(Overlap

of these colors)

(New dimensions

are shown)

(Overlap

of these shadows)

(New essentials

are shown)

Removal

of a past in fallacy

Removal

of all pain

(Seems to our minds,

beyond reach)

But change

in perception

From here on out

can change

What future path

we see

As we’re

standing on this…

(Boundary)

Vision multiplies

(Searching)

Internalized

(Emotions)

Facing hatred

For what

we can now

(Accomplish)

Every clue’s around us

(Floating)

Anything can revive

Are we able to

break out of slumber

Worries

and the conflicts

Stab into us like

thorns on a dark vine

To the shadows

if you wanna hide

We see the way

It’s time to arise

Extremes

confining reason

Creation:

mass divisions refined

Conquer

walls of dimensions

Inflated observations

We’re bound to find

The truth inside,

beyond selves

Without us

ever knowing

Formation of a world

deep within our minds

Visions appearing

taking over

Driven to one side

If you can find

The cause inside

Defeat it, now!

Extremes

confining reason

Creation:

mass divisions refined

Inflated observations

We’re bound to find

The truth inside,

beyond selves, ah

We know that beyond

misery’s the world

Stories

that once divided us

Now unite

as one

Dark shades

attract the brightness

As brightness guide

the shadows we hide

Shatter

all preconception

This future

destination

Opposing sides

will interweave

Beyond

selves

Extremes

confining reason

Creation:

mass divisions refined

Conquer

walls of dimensions

Inflated observations

We’re bound to find

The truth inside,

beyond selves

To comprehend

all integrity

Jump boundaries

Unite
